name: Super Mario on Scratch Halloween - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch Halloween - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch Halloween that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/420456768/

Credits -

Nintendo for Mario, sounds/music

Me for the art.

Level design and ideas by triangle5820 on Scratch and FunnyAnimatorJimTV on Scratch

Mario text style by Olivermario12 on Scratch

Scrolling engine by griffpatch on Scratch

Mobile joystick by MaxyBrian on Scratch

Music from Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii and DS

Special Thanks to -

_meow_gobo_ on Scratch

b1048546 on Scratch

Bunnynightfan on Scratch

-TheMarioRock- on Scratch
